name: Desafio #4: O Primeiro passageiro
description: Neste desafio você deve levar o passageiro até sua cidade de destino.
shortDocumentation:
In this challenge your task is to move the only vehicle from city A to city C.

Vehicle Class

moveTo(targetCity) Method
- targetCity can be an string with the city ID or an instance of City

victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, util, stats) { return stats.passengersDelivered > 0; }

defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, util, stats) { return stats.elapsedTimeSeconds > 10; }
